class.comment: Represents the direction that packets are being sent between the server and the client.

enumerations.name: SERVERBOUND
enumerations.comment: Packets sent from the client to the server.

enumerations.name: CLIENTBOUND
enumerations.comment: Packets sent from the server to the client.

return.comment: The opposite direction of this packet flow direction.

getOpposite.comment: Gets the opposite direction of this direction.
